author: Staff Reporter
text:
COIMBATORE: Three Indian Gaurs, including two calves, were found dead in an unused open well on the land belonging to C. Shanmugam at Adhigaratty in Kundha Range, in The Nilgiris, on Saturday. The bodies were retrieved on Sunday.

A post-mortem examination was conducted by a veterinarian, after which the remains were buried.

District Forest Officer C. Badrasamy said that the Indian Gaurs could have been chased by a tiger and they could have accidentally fallen into the well.
title: Three Indian gaurs found dead in a well
